Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>So, remember that fragment I had?
The one that showed a single,
mysterious figure?
I found more fragments among the
things our survey team brought back
from the Depths.
And guess what? <sp:5:0:0>They fit together like
puzzle pieces!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_02>If you <clr:0000>follow the gaze<clr:ffff> of each statue,
that will lead you to the <clr:0000>temple-like
building <clr:ffff>with the strange hand symbol.<sp:5:1:0>
Some sort of Zonai figure must be
standing in front of that building.

I have no doubt that this mural originates
from the Zonai civilization.

<sp:3:0:2:0400>It's speculated that the Zonai wielded
<clr:0000>mysterious powers<clr:ffff>. So maybe...
just MAYBE!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I can feel a big discovery coming on!
Let's figure it out together and then we
can surprise Doc!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Swordsman, what is it? You look very
pleased with yourself...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0b01>C-<sp:5:1:0>could it be?!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Feast your eyes upon this amazing mural!


<sp:3:0:2:0500>This scene shows that there's a whole
series of statues down there, like the one
you found for me last time.
But what really caught my attention is
<clr:0000>the way they're oriented<clr:ffff>. Each figure is
pointed toward the next one in the series.
Until it ends with that last statue facing
a final destination—a building that looks
like a <clr:0000>temple<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Also, see those large ears on the figure
at the front of the building? That's got to
be one of the Zonai.
And then there's that strange hand
symbol that seems to be responding
to whatever the Zonai is doing.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_03>Hmmm. Not that. Nope, not that either.


AHA! <sp:5:1:0>Here we go!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_01>So to collect my thoughts on all of this...


I'm pretty sure if you <clr:0000>follow the gaze <clr:ffff>of
each of those statues down there, you'll
reach that structure.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'm also betting that the <clr:0000>temple-like
building <clr:ffff>holds something of Zonai origin.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I've heard that the Zonai wielded
<clr:0000>mysterious powers<clr:ffff>... <sp:5:0:0>I wonder if this
correlates to those powers.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, Swordsman!


Where are you taking that? I want you to
show me here!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Of course, all of this is still just
speculation on my part.

Sooo...


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>That's where you come in, Swordsman!


I want you to find the <clr:0000>temple structure<clr:ffff>
depicted in the mural.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Initially I figured I could just go myself,
so I gathered a bunch of <clr:0000>brightblooms<clr:ffff>
and supplies.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>But they pulled the "kid card" on me and
said I couldn't go into <clr:0000>the Depths<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0000>So...<sp:5:0:0>here.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, Swordsman!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>That's different from the <clr:0000>Autobuild
ability<clr:ffff>, right?

It's supposed to be the <clr:0000>ability to replicate
things<clr:ffff>—not assemble them piece by
piece, right?
So, please. Show me how <clr:0000>Autobuild<clr:ffff>
works and fix <clr:0000>Goggles's balloon<clr:ffff>!
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_04>Swordsman! <sp:5:0:0>Everything's ready!


Please demonstrate how <clr:0000>Autobuild<clr:ffff>
replicates things!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Ease_00>This must be the mysterious power
the Zonai had...

I never thought I'd see such a marvel with
my very own eyes.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_03>Thank you for making this a reality.
Please, take this. I've been saving it
for a special occasion.
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_03>There was an incredible power lying
hidden in the Depths after all...

I think I'll keep researching the Depths,
going forward.

Who knows? I just might find a clue about
Princess Zelda.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>If you make any new discoveries in the
Depths, please let me know, Swordsman!
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>This...<sp:5:1:0> This mysterious power goes
beyond scientific explanation.
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Um... Your pouch is full.


I wanted to give you my special
<clr:0000>large zonaite<clr:ffff>!

Come find me once you've got space in
your pouch.
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Did you make room? I've been saving this
for a special occasion. Here!
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>Look at you! Up and fixing balloons left
and right.<sp:3:0:2:0701> You still need to collect a
reward from Josha for the help.
I want to go to <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> soon, but
let's make sure you get your reward
first, hm?
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>It looks like a <clr:0000>schema stone for a balloon<clr:ffff>.


I wonder if you could use that new
<clr:0000>Autobuild <clr:ffff>power for this...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Inspiration_00>Oh! I've got <sp:5:0:0>an idea!
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>A-<sp:5:0:0>U-<sp:5:0:0>T-<sp:5:0:0>O-<sp:5:0:0><sp:5:0:0>build<sp:5:0:0>!


With the ability to <sp:5:1:0>INSTANTLY <clr:0000>replicate<clr:ffff>
things you've built?!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>Wow. So there really was a Zonai temple
housing a <clr:0000>mysterious power<clr:ffff> down in
<clr:0000>the Depths<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm... <sp:5:0:0>Since all that was true, then there's
something more I want to check on with
the <clr:0000>things collected<clr:ffff> from <clr:0000>the Depths<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Wait here just a sec!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Painful_01>I...I...<sp:5:1:0> I can't believe it! You rebuilt the
balloon in an instant!
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>There's the added bonus that checking
out the Depths might provide us with
clues to help find Princess Zelda.
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Determination_00>So if it all works out, maybe you'll snag
some <clr:0000>mysterious power <clr:ffff>for yourself AND
gain clues about Princess Zelda!
Nothing but good things, right? Thanks
for your help with this, <sp:5:0:0>Swordsman!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_03>That balloon over there belongs to
Goggles, but it's broken right now.

Do you think you might be able to fix it
with <clr:0000>Autobuild<clr:ffff>?
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_03><clr:0000>Brightblooms<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>arrows<clr:ffff> are perfect for
exploring the Depths!
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Eep! So exciting! I want to see it in action
pronto. I'll go prepare really quick!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Show me the <clr:0000>replication ability<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>Autobuild<clr:ffff>,
that you found in the Depths. You can
use it to fix <clr:0000>Goggles's balloon<clr:ffff>!
I'm so excited!
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I still haven't been able to figure out
what that is.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>But judging from that light, it's gotta be
Zonai in origin!

Since you can use Zonai powers, I think it
would be better for you to have it.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>A-<sp:5:0:0>U-<sp:5:0:0>T-<sp:5:0:0>O-<sp:5:0:0><sp:5:0:0>build<sp:5:0:0>!


With the ability to <sp:5:0:0>INSTANTLY <clr:0000>replicate<clr:ffff>
things you've built?!

AND schema stones?!


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>So there really was a Zonai temple
housing a <clr:0000>mysterious power<clr:ffff> down in
<clr:0000>the Depths<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm...<sp:5:0:0> That may also mean...that some of
the <clr:0000>things collected<clr:ffff> from <clr:0000>the Depths <clr:ffff>may
give us other clues...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Wait here just a sec!
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>You mean to tell me you already found
the temple?!

And? What was in there?!
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>This is a <clr:0000>schema stone for a
balloon<clr:ffff>, <sp:5:0:0>right?

So if you used this with <clr:0000>Autobuild<clr:ffff>, you
could replicate a balloon. <sp:5:0:0>Right?

I'm thinking...
